xwikidoc.title: Calendar Translations
xwikidoc.content:
xwiki.calendar.monthNames=['Január', 'Február', 'Marec', 'Apríl', 'Máj', 'Jún', 'Júl', 'August', 'September', 'Október', 'November', 'December'] xwiki.calendar.monthNamesShort=['Jan', 'Febr', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'Máj', 'Jún', 'Júl', 'Aug', 'Sept', 'Okt', 'Nov', 'Dec'] xwiki.calendar.dayNames=['Nedeľa', 'Pondelok', 'Utorok', 'Streda', 'Štvrtok', 'Piatok', 'Sobota'] xwiki.calendar.dayNamesShort=['Ned', 'Pon', 'Ut', 'Str', 'Štv', 'Pia', 'Sob']
### Missing: xwiki.calendar.columnFormat.month=ddd ### Missing: xwiki.calendar.columnFormat.week=ddd M/D ### Missing: xwiki.calendar.columnFormat.day=dddd M/D
### Missing: xwiki.calendar.event.description=Description: ### Missing: xwiki.calendar.event.location=Location: ### Missing: xwiki.calendar.event.status=Status:
### Missing: xwiki.calendar.titleFormat.month=MMMM YYYY ### Missing: xwiki.calendar.titleFormat.week=MMM D YYYY ### Missing: xwiki.calendar.titleFormat.day=dddd, MMM D, YYYY
### Missing: xwiki.calendar.timeFormat=h(:mm)t ### Missing: xwiki.calendar.axisFormat=h(:mm)t
### Missing: xwiki.calendar.allDayText=All day xwiki.calendar.button.today=dnes xwiki.calendar.button.day=deň xwiki.calendar.button.week=týždeň xwiki.calendar.button.month=mesiac
### Missing: xwiki.calendar.notification.inprogress=Saving... xwiki.calendar.notification.done=Uložené xwiki.calendar.notification.error=Nepodarilo sa uložiť dokument.
rendering.macro.calendar.name=Kalendár rendering.macro.calendar.description=Zobraziť kalendár rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.gApiKey.name=gApiKey ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.gApiKey.description=Key for the Google Calendar API. rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.gCal.name=gCal ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.gCal.description=Google calendar IDs separated by commas. rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.json.name=JSON ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.json.description=URL to a page generating JSON. This is only needed if the JSON generated by the Calendar.JSONService does not fit your needs. rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.updateurl.name=Aktualizovať URL ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.updateurl.description=URL page to update events when they are moved or resized in the Calendar. The 'editable' parameter needs to be set to true for this field to be used. ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.classname.name=Classname ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.classname.description=Classname where the event objects are stored. The parameter is necessary unless a JSON service and and Update URL are provided ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.startfield.name=Start Field ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.startfield.description=Field in the object where the start date of the events are stored. The field needs to be a date field. The parameter is necessary unless a JSON service and and Update URL are provided rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.durationfield.name=Doba trvania ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.durationfield.description=Field in the object where the duration of the events are stored. The field needs to be a date field. The parameter is necessary unless a JSON service and and Update URL are provided rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.editable.name=Editovateľné ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.editable.description=Used to activate the edit feature allowing to move events rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.defaultView.name=Predvolené zobrazenie ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.defaultView.description=Default agenda to show on load of the agenda. Possible values are: month, agendaWeek, agendaDay, basicWeek, basicDay rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.year.name=Rok ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.year.description=Year of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.month.name=Mesiac ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.month.description=Month (from 0 to 11) of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.date.name=Deň ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.date.description=Day (from 1 to 31) of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.firstDay.name=Prvý deň ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.firstDay.description=First day (from 0 being Sunday to 6 being Monday) of the week to show in the calendar. Leave empty for Monday rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.firstHour.name=Prvá hodina ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.firstHour.description=First hour to show in the calendar. Leave empty for default ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.minTime.name=Min Time ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.minTime.description=First time to show in the calendar. Users won't see hours before this time. Leave empty for default (8.00) ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.maxTime.name=Max Time ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.maxTime.description=Last time to show in the calendar. Users won't see hours after this time. Leave empty for default (23.00)
